attributes.action: Change school/work to begin and finish at a later time
attributes.additional_details: Because it can potentially improve the quality of work and reduces work related stress as well as allowing workers to enjoy their job more and students to focus more on studies.
attributes.background: Students and workers need more rest and more free time, so they won’t get tired throughout the day.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about working hours are a matter for individuals and their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

Similarly, decisions about when the school day starts are a matter for individual schools, but the Government could impose new requirements on schools regarding when the school day starts, and we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Start school at 10am to help teenagers with tiredness: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
